patterns: Can you tell me a joke
responses:
Why doesn't the sun go to college? 
Because it has a million degrees!

What did one traffic light say to the other? 
Stop looking at me, I'm changing!

Have you ever tried eating a clock? 
It's really time-consuming, especially if you go for seconds.

What is sticky and brown? 
A stick!

Why did the gym close down? 
It just didn't work out!

patterns: Do you have any solution for my problem
responses: Buddy Keep yourself distracted from problems
If possible, do your best to distract yourself from overthinking. Read a book or go for a walk or finish a puzzle.
Find ways to engage yourself
Try watching some standups will be helpful
Depression can be well managed and there can be wonderful life beyond depression

patterns: Do you recommend me any medication for me
Will so and so medicine really help me?
responses: I cannot recommend any medication, but if you feel you need them you should meet a doctor

patterns: i feel like having mental breakdown

responses:
Buddy dont speak like that, I know this is a difficult time but don't lose hope.
 Eventually things will get better.

Cheer up friend, you are going through a rough patch
 but things will get better soon.

Everything will be alright, there is always a sunrise after a sunset,
 have faith in yourself.

You could try painting, stitching or origami,etc
Try searching 'funny videos' on youtube, you will not be dissapointed

patterns: What advice do you have for me?
responses: Talking with your friends and family can have a huge positive effect on your mood.
